arts.ttl: Merseyside derby buildup, Manchester United v Chelsea and more – matchday live
arts.sum: ⚽ Previews, team news and buildup to Saturday’s games ⚽ Premier League things to look out for | Mail Matchday live There were two Friday matches in the WSL last night, with Tottenham enduring a dismal start to the weekend. The London side suffered a 5-1 defeat to Manchester City at Brisbane Road, putting an end to their perfect start to the season. Aoba Fujino, Vivianne Miedema, Kerstin Casparij, Grace Clinton and Laura Coombs all got on the scoresheet for City, with Olivia Holdt netting a late consolation for Spurs. Continue reading...
